name: The Last Jam
description:
Controls : Left and Right keys

Objective:  Navigate the mazes, traverse every tile on the stage. A stage is complete when there is at least one free space left on the stage). The game ends after 10 stages or when the timer runs out!

Developed in Unity. 

    

Free space


(the above space is an Unavailable space). Free spaces turn into these tiles after exiting them

(The above space does not change when exited). If the tiles on the left and right of these tiles are unavailable, you can press left to jump down to the next row!

(this space must be exited twice before becoming unvailable)
